person.content:

Paragraph: " President Kwasniewski plans to visit Italy on a invitation from President Oscar Scalfaro .

| Person |
|--------|

| President Oscar Scalfaro |

|--------|

| President Oscar Scalfaro |

(Note: In this context, both "President" and the names "Kwasniewski" and "Scalfaro" clearly refer to persons.)
